products.title: Vitra Blackout Kitty Pink Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Kitty Pink Roller Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £8.77 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Vitra Blackout is one of our most popular ranges available in a variety of vibrant colours at an affordable price.
Revamp your home or office space with a stunning Vitra Blackout Kitty Pink roller blind.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX1433 Fabric Colour: Kitty Pink Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Vitra Blackout Bambino Pink Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Bambino Pink Roller Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £8.77 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
If you wish to introduce a little uplifting colour into your interior then the Vitra Blackout Bambino Pink Roller Blind is ideal. Whether you have a simple pastel scheme or a room rich in vibrant pinks, this blind is sure to enhance the look. This sweet, springtime pink will help to brighten up your space, and the blackout design will help maintain the peaceful ambience.

products.title: Vitra Blackout Kitty Pink Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Kitty Pink Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra in Pink. Made to measure from £38.98 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Vitra Blackout is one of our most popular blackout fabrics.  In several fresh, bright shades, this fabric is a  great way for you to upgrade your skylight window at a value cost. 
 
This option comes with sleek, modern Aluminium framework. 
 
This blackout fabric has a colour match backing and provides up to 20% heat loss reduction.

products.title: Vitra Blackout Kitty Pink Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Kitty Pink Electric Roller Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Vitra Blackout is one of our most popular ranges available in a variety of vibrant colours at an affordable price. 
 Revamp your home or office space with a stunning Vitra Blackout Kitty Pink roller blind. The electric feature makes it easy to use and ideal for windows that are difficult to reach.
